HomePage.title: Smart Waste Management for a
HomePage.description: Revolutionary IoT-powered smart bins that optimize waste collection, reduce environmental impact, and create cleaner, smarter cities through intelligent monitoring and AI-driven insights.

features.title: Intelligent Features
features.description: Discover how our smart bin technology transforms waste management with cutting-edge IoT sensors, AI analytics, and real-time monitoring.

monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
monitoring.description: Advanced sensors track fill levels, temperature, and usage patterns with 99.9% accuracy, enabling proactive waste management.

optimization.title: Route Optimization
optimization.description: AI-powered algorithms optimize collection routes, reducing fuel consumption by up to 40% and improving operational efficiency.

categorization.title: Smart Sorting
categorization.description: Computer vision and machine learning automatically categorize waste types, improving recycling rates by 60%.

tracking.title: Impact Tracking
tracking.description: Comprehensive analytics track environmental impact, carbon footprint reduction, and sustainability metrics in real-time.

mobile.title: Mobile Integration
mobile.description: Intuitive mobile app provides real-time notifications, collection schedules, and gamified recycling rewards.

ai.title: AI Analytics
ai.description: Machine learning algorithms predict waste patterns, optimize collection schedules, and provide actionable insights.

stats.title: Proven Impact
stats.description: Our smart bin technology has delivered measurable results across cities worldwide, creating a more sustainable future.
stats.efficiencyDesc: Average improvement in waste collection efficiency
stats.usersDesc: Citizens actively using our smart bin network
stats.wasteDesc: Total waste processed through our smart system
stats.citiesDesc: Smart cities using our waste management solution

tech.title: Technology Stack
tech.description: Built with cutting-edge technologies to ensure reliability, scalability, and seamless integration with existing city infrastructure.

iot.title: IoT Hardware
iot.description: Advanced sensors and microcontrollers for real-time data collection and wireless communication.

cloud.title: Cloud Infrastructure
cloud.description: Scalable cloud platform for data processing, storage, and real-time analytics with 99.9% uptime.

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Cross-platform mobile apps for citizens, collectors, and administrators with offline capabilities.

data.title: Data Management
data.description: High-performance databases and streaming platforms for real-time data processing and analytics.

ai.title: AI & Machine Learning
ai.description: Advanced ML models for predictive analytics, computer vision, and intelligent decision making.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: Enterprise-grade security protocols ensuring data privacy and system integrity.

cta.title: Join the Smart City Revolution
cta.description: Ready to transform your city's waste management? Connect with our team to learn how smart bins can create a cleaner, more sustainable future.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Speak with our experts about implementing smart bins in your city.

github.title: Open Source
github.description: Explore our open-source components and contribute to the project.

community.title: Join Community
community.description: Connect with developers, city planners, and sustainability advocates.

AboutPage.title: About Smart Bin
AboutPage.description: Smart Bin is an intelligent waste management system designed to optimize waste collection and promote environmental sustainability.
